abstract: With the focus on the Brewers' sausage race this week, The Quad fulfills requests for another sausage tailgate recipe.
snippet: With the focus on the Brewers' sausage race this week, The Quad fulfills requests for another sausage tailgate recipe.
lead_paragraph: A Times article this week about the Milwaukee Brewers' sausage race inspired some of those close to The Quad to demand a sausage-based recipe in time for this weekend's games. We've already had mouths watering with a bratwurst stew, but it is difficult to turn down a request and, well, you can't have too much tubular meat at a tailgate party.

headline.main: Tailgating Recipes: Sausage and Cheese Chowder
